DOC.brief_title: Single-Ascending Dose Study AMG 333 Healthy Subjects Subjects With Migraines
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , ascend single-dose study evaluate AMG 333 healthy subject subject migraine . The study consist 8 cohort : 7 cohort healthy subject 1 cohort subject migraine . For cohort 1 7 , 8 subject enrol , subject randomize 6 subject receive AMG 333 2 subject receive placebo ( 3:1 ratio ) . In cohort 8 , 24 subject migraine enrol , depend enrollment rate emerge safety tolerability data . These migraine subject randomize receive AMG 333 placebo crossover fashion . Both healthy migraine subject monitor house 4 day allow return home remainder 14 day observation period . Both healthy migraine subject keep headache diary .
